1001.description: Deploys Lv. 1 Supplies at the designated location
1001.name: Inherent Supplies

1002.description: Removes a Standoff and grants 2 Supplies
1002.name: Basic Negotiation

1004.description: Builds a Base Station that provides 1 Processing Progress per turn on a specified empty space
1004.name: Base Station

1005.description: Upgrades a specified Lv. 1 cell to Lv. 2
1005.name: Play by Ear

1006.description: Reduces the duration of a Visbane by 6 rounds
1006.name: Efficient Combat

1007.description: Upgrades a specified Lv. 1 or Lv. 2 cell to Lv. 3
1007.name: Improvision

1008.description: Instantly gain all Supplies in a 3×3 area and remove all corresponding cells
1008.name: Supply Integration

1009.description: Removes all Standoffs in a 5×5 area and grants 2 Supplies for each one removed
1009.name: Sound Argument

1011.description: Deploys Lv. 3 Supplies at the designated location
1011.name: Airdrop Supplies

1013.description: Upgrades a specified cell to Lv. 4
1013.name: Strategic Planning

1014.description: Instantly gain all Manpower in a 3×3 area and remove all corresponding cells
1014.name: Tactical Dispatch

1016.description: Connects a specified open space with a Blockade Anchor Point and grants 50 Processing Progress
1016.name: Anchor Point Blockade

1017.description: Eliminates the Heavenly Father and wins the game
1017.name: Done Deal
